content: अभिकाम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कम्-अच् or अभिवृद्धः कामो यस्य] Affectionate, loving, desirous, wishing for, lustful, with the object of love in <ab>acc.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab>; याचे त्वामभिकामाहं <ls>Mb.</ls> --मः {@--1@} Affection, love. {@--2@} Wish, desire. --मं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Longingly, with desire.
